meanings.definition: Relating to the psychological effects of sound on the human mind.
meanings.sent1: The psychoacoustic impact of the music helped calm her nerves.
meanings.sent2: The researchers conducted a psychoacoustic study on the effects of different tones.
meanings.sent3: The psychoacoustic nature of the melody made her smile uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a psychoacoustic quality that resonated deeply with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The psychoacoustic experience of the concert was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The study of how humans perceive and interpret sound.
meanings.sent1: She found the field of psychoacoustic fascinating and engaging.
meanings.sent2: The professor specialized in psychoacoustic research.
meanings.sent3: The psychoacoustic class was full of interesting experiments.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, psychoacoustic plays a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on psychoacoustic theory was informative and clear.
